p: Kabbaoui et al. [ 2] investigated the antidiabetic effect of T. satureioides aqueous extracts obtained from the aerial parts on streptozotocin- (STZ-) induced diabetic rats via the administration of an oral concentration of 500â€‰mg/kg. As a result, T. satureioides aqueous extracts decreased significantly blood glucose levels and improved body weight and glucose tolerance in STZ-diabetic rats.
